64902.<pc>は オアシスの水を\nツボの中に 注ぎ込んだ！:
<pc> poured Oasis Water into
the pot!

64903.中から 声が 聞こえてくる……。: I hear voices coming from inside.

64904.<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00080_00064904><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Wow! This is without a doubt my Al-
Ahagiro's Oasis Water!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64265.<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00110_00064265><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Goku goku goku. I can move. I can
move!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64905.なんと ツボの中から\nわかめ王子が あらわれた！: King Kelp emerged from the pot!

64267.<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00265_00064267><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Pfft! I'm back to life! I almost
turned into salt kelp.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64268.<voice 00295_00064268><start_lip_sync m1:
I was drying up in the desert and took refuge here, but when I went into the pot in search of water, to my
surprise, it was also empty.

64269.<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00351_00064269><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Moreover, once I got in, I couldn't
get out this time. This body is really
inconvenient.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64270.<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00421_00064270><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Well, then, stranger. What is your
name?<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64271.<voice 00461_00064271><start_lip_sync m1:
Hmmm. . Thank you for doing this on such short notice. Thank you for your hard work. This is a
courtesy!

64272.<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00582_00064272><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Ha! If I can move now, I must return
to my country, the Kingdom of Al-
Ahagiro, as soon as possible!<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

64273.<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00622_00064273><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Hmmm.... I may look like this, but I
am the king of Al-Ahagiro.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000079.<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00623_29000079><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>What? Al-Ahagiro, you mean you are
King Moonis?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000080.<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00662_29000080><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>M. Your face is suspicious, isn't it?
It's true! There is a reason for this.<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000081.<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m1:
<voice 00702_29000081><start_lip_sync m14603 _normal m00001>Oh, man! We don't have time to talk
about that!
<stop_lip_animation m14603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000082.<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00703_29000082><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>I've been gone for a long time. I'm
worried about my Al-Ahagiro! Well,
goodbye, everybody!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000084.<voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00705_29000084><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Is that real?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000086.<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00707_29000086><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>He certainly has the personality of
the King Moonis we met in the past.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000087.<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00708_29000087><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>But wouldn't it be a big deal to go

29000088.<voice 00709_29000088><start_lip_sync n0:
